254137.<pc>が声をかけても\nディージアは 目を閉じたまま 動かない。\nどうやら:
When calls out to her, Digea remains motionless with her eyes closed. It appears that she has already breathed her
last...

254138.<pc>宛ての 手紙を見つけた。\nどうやら ディージアが 書いたもののようだ。:
<pc> found a letter addressed to
them. It seems to have been written by Digea.
<pc> read the letter.

258554.突然 こんなことになって\nきっと 驚かれたことでしょう。\nごめんなさいね。:
I am sure you must have been surprised by this
sudden turn of events. I am sorry.

258555.あなたには 隠していたけれど\nわたくしの身体は 魔瘴に 深く侵されていて\nい:
Although I didn't tell you, I was deeply
infected with demon miasma, and it wouldn't be
surprising if my body soon reached its limit.

258556.だから あなたの衣装を 完成させられないまま\n死ぬのかしらと ハラハラしたもの:
That's why I was working so hard, wondering if
I could finish your outfit before I died...
I'm so glad I made it in time.

258557.さっそく 衣装を 着てみてくださいな。\n優美だけれど 恐ろしくて おごそか。\:
Please try on the outfit right away. Graceful,
yet terrifying and majestic. Isn't this the
perfect outfit for the Demon Lord?

258558.両肩にドクロの飾りは やっぱり 素敵。\nブラッドスピネルは 仮面に使いましたの:
The skull decorations on both shoulders are
wonderful. I used Blood Spinel for the mask.
Personally, the mask is my favorite part.

258559.衣装を着たあなたを 見られないのは 残念ですが\nデザイナー人生の終わりに 最高:
I'm sorry I won't be able to see you wear it,
but I was happy to be able to make the best
outfit at the end of my life as a designer.

258560.わたくしが死ねば 心優しいあなたは\n悲しんでくださるのでしょう。\nけれど そ:
I'm sure that if I die, someone as
kind-hearted as you will be saddened. But you
mustn't show that face to anyone.

258561.あなたは 魔界を統べる お方。\n魔族も魔物も あなたの前に ひれ伏す。\n王が:
You are the ruler of the Demon World. Demons
and monsters alike will bow down before you.
The king must not show them a shameful face.

258562.いつも誰かの 痛みや悲しみに 寄りそってきた\n優しい心は 仮面の下に お隠しな:
That kind heart that understands the pain and
sorrow of others should be hidden under a
mask.

258563.なぜなら あなたは 大魔王なのですから。: Because you are the Demon Lord.

258564.<pc>と ショーナは\n家の近くにある墓地に ディージアのなきがらを\n埋葬し:
<pc> and Shauna bury Digea's
remains in a graveyard near the house before
returning to the Demon Lord's castle.
